00020 #include "BonnMotionFileCache.h"
00021 #include "FWMath.h"

00024 Define_Module(BonnMotionMobility);

00027 void BonnMotionMobility::initialize(int stage)
00028 {
00029     LineSegmentsMobilityBase::initialize(stage);
00030 
00031     EV << "initializing BonnMotionMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00032 
00033     if(stage == 0)
00034     {
00035         int nodeId = par("nodeId");
00036         if (nodeId == -1)
00037             nodeId = getParentModule()->getIndex();
00038 
00039         const char *fname = par("traceFile");
00040         const BonnMotionFile *bmFile = BonnMotionFileCache::getInstance()->getFile(fname);
00041 
00042         vecp = bmFile->getLine(nodeId);
00043         if (!vecp)
00044             error("invalid nodeId %d -- no such line in file '%s'", nodeId, fname);
00045         vecpos = 0;
00046 
00047         // obtain initial position
00048         const BonnMotionFile::Line& vec = *vecp;
00049         if (vec.size()>=3){
00050             move.startPos.setX(vec[1]);
00051             move.startPos.setY(vec[2]);
00052 
00053       move.startTime = vec[0];
00054 
00055       //vecpos += 3;
00056             targetPos = move.startPos;
00057       targetTime = simTime();
00058       //stepTarget = move.startPos;
00059 
00060       //dummy value; speed not used in BonnMotion
00061       move.speed = 1;
00062       EV << "start pos: t=" << move.startTime << move.startPos.info() << endl;
00063         }
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 BonnMotionMobility::~BonnMotionMobility()
00068 {
00069     BonnMotionFileCache::deleteInstance();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void BonnMotionMobility::setTargetPosition()
00073 {
00074     const BonnMotionFile::Line& vec = *vecp;
00075 
00076     if (vecpos+2 >= vec.size())
00077     {
00078   move.speed = 0;
00079   EV << "host is stationary now!!!\n";
00080         return;
00081     }
00082 
00083     targetTime = vec[vecpos];
00084     targetPos.setX(vec[vecpos+1]);
00085     targetPos.setY(vec[vecpos+2]);
00086     vecpos += 3;
00087 
00088     EV << "TARGET: t=" << targetTime << targetPos.info() << "\n";
00089 }
00090 
00091 void BonnMotionMobility::fixIfHostGetsOutside()
00092 {
00093     Coord dummy; 
00094     double dum;
00095 
00096     handleIfOutside( RAISEERROR, stepTarget, dummy, dummy, dum );
00097 }
